code: import{BUTTON_CLICKED,BUTTON_RESET,IS_LOADING}from"./types";export var buttonClicked=function buttonClicked(){return function(dispatch,getState){dispatch({type:BUTTON_CLICKED});};};export var buttonReset=function buttonReset(){return function(dispatch,getState){dispatch({type:BUTTON_RESET});};};export var isLoading=function isLoading(){return function(dispatch,getState){dispatch({type:IS_LOADING});};};
